dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.evt.AnomolySecurityEvent
dataStructure.description:
Several event types are set aside, primarily as placeholders, pending development of better standards and guidance on how the data elements they may contain are defined. The anomaly event type is one of these types. The elements that are used to extend the base event type for anomalies consist of a text field to describe the anomaly and a text field to contain log data.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: AnomolySecurityEvent

child.name: description
child.description:
Descriptive information about the event.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: logData
child.description:
Text from logs that captured information relevant to the event.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: logData
